attributes.action: Legalise public use of e-scooters on all roads, pathways and cycle lanes in UK
attributes.additional_details: Reducing traffic, e-scooters are quicker than walking and it wouldn’t make too much difference to how things are now, everywhere you look there’s riders, on my way to work I see at least 6 and I only drive for about 15mins.
attributes.background: There’s been a massive rise in e-scooters on our roads and pathways but the rules remain unclear and people seem to be ignoring it anyway so make it clearer and legalise the use of them as there’s very little downside to them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107
